data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Churu, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Churu, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,992,320 who are far from you in Churu, Rajasthan, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Churu.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Churu, Rajasthan, India.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bania people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bania people.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Churu unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, you gave the church of Churu, Rajasthan, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary:
the county of Churu, Rajasthan, India has a population of 2,039,500.

We estimate Churu has 22,435 people who might know Jesus, 24,746 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,992,320 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Churu against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

location.name: Churu
location.people_groups_list: Rabari (Hindu traditions), Burara, Sirvi, Pajavgir, Godhi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rabari (Hindu traditions) (1,058,000), Burara (300), Sirvi (311,000), Pajavgir (2,200), Godhi (700)
